name: Digging hero
description:
Digging hero is a tower defense without towers.

You control a dwarf who is trying to protect the hidden city by digging holes and making the enemies to fall down.

Controls:

  • Use W A S D keys to move
  • Hold the SpaceBar to dig a hole, Every time you dig a hole you will take more time to dig the next one
  • press Esc key to quit the game

this is just a prototype of the game.

Game Created by:

Oscar Eduardo Gonzalez Anaya (Programmer,Sound)

Raul Isaak Cerda Balcazar (Programmer)

Jesus Daniel Ponce Guerra (Graphic Designer)

Carlos Alejandro Lanz Hernandez (Graphic Designer)
